content: While I'm a staunch BBC supporter/defender, I can't see the need or fit for its new BBC+ portal-style app. Surely it only invites further criticism from commercial rivals? http://www.bbc.co.uk/mediacentre/latestnews/2016/bbc-plus-app
summary: While I'm a BBC defender I can't see the need/fit for new BBC+ app. Surely invites criticism from commercial rivals? http://www.bbc.co.uk/mediacentre/latestnews/2016/bbc-plus-app
